enWisdom: Etiquettes are earned
Etiquettes are renewed vestments
Good etiquette is the best trait
Good etiquette is the perfection of man
Good etiquette is one of the two distinguishing merits
The best honour is good etiquette
The best etiquette is preserving one’s magnanimity

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْأَدَبِ مَا بَدَأْتَ بِهِ نَفْسَكَ
enWisdom: The best etiquette is that [in] which you start with yourself

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْأَدَبِ أَنْ يَقِفَ الْإِنْسَانُ عِنْدَ [عَلَى‏] حَدِّهِ وَلَا يَتَعَدَّى قَدْرَهُ
enWisdom: The best etiquette is for a person to stay within his limits and not go beyond his rank

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ الْآدَابِ مَا كَفَّكَ عَنِ الْمَحَارِمِ
enWisdom: The best of etiquettes is that which stops you from what is forbidden

Wisdom: إِنَّ النَّاسَ إِلَى صَالِحِ الْأَدَبِ أَحْوَجُ مِنْهُمْ إِلَى الْفِضَّةِ وَالذَّهَبِ
enWisdom: People are more in need of good etiquette than of silver and gold

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِلَى اكْتِسَابِ الْأَدَبِ أَحْوَجُ مِنْكُمْ إِلَى اكْتِسَابِ الْفِضَّةِ وَالذَّهَبِ
enWisdom: Indeed you are more in need of acquiring good etiquette than you are of acquiring silver and gold
You are gauged by your etiquette so beautify it with forbearance
Through good etiquette brainpower is sharpened
The fruit of good etiquette is good character

Wisdom: ثَلَاثٌ لَيْسَ عَلَيْهِنَّ مُسْتَزَادٌ حُسْنُ الْأَدَبِ وَمُجَانَبَةُ الرَّيْبِ وَالْكَفُّ عَنِ الْمَحَارِمِ
enWisdom: There are three things which one always needs to seek more of: Good etiquette, avoidance of suspicion, and abstinence from all that is forbidden

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الْأَدَبِ خَيْرُ مُوَازِرٍ وَأَفْضَلُ قَرِينٍ
enWisdom: Good etiquette is the best supporter and finest companion
The means of purifying [one’s] character is good etiquette

Wisdom: طَالِبُ الْأَدَبِ أَحْزَمُ مِنْ طَالِبِ الذَّهَبِ
enWisdom: The seeker of good etiquette is wiser than the seeker of gold

Wisdom: كَفَاكَ مُؤَدِّباً لِنَفْسِكَ تَجَنُّبُ مَا كَرِهْتَهُ مِنْ غَيْرِكَ
enWisdom: In order to discipline yourself, it is enough that you keep away from [doing] that which you hate from others
Every person has a need (or for every affair there is [a proper] etiquette)
Whoever is keen about [acquiring] good etiquette, his vices will decrease

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَهْتَرَ بِالْأَدَبِ فَقَدْ زَانَ نَفْسَهُ
enWisdom: One who is infatuated with [good] etiquette has adorned himself
There is no adornment like good etiquette
There is no heritage like etiquette
There is no vestment like good etiquette

Wisdom: لَا يَرْأَسُ مَنْ خَلَا عَنِ الْأَدَبِ وَصَبَا إِلَى اللَّعِبِ
enWisdom: He who lacks good etiquette and inclines towards idle play does not become a leader
